endpoints.description: Submit a new alert to be communicated to residents in the target region.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific alert, identified by its ID.
Update the content or scope of a specific alert.
Remove an alert, halting any further dissemination.
List all defined regions available for targeted alerts.
Define a new region for alert dissemination.
Retrieve a list of emergency resources available for allocation.
Allocate specific resources to a region during an emergency.
View logs of all communication attempts made through the service.
Submit feedback regarding a communicated alert to improve future service.
